text: The 1922 Argentine Primera División was the 31st season of top-flight football in Argentina. Huracán win its second consecutive championship, while Independiente obtained its first title, the Asociación Amateurs de Football championship. ==Final tables== ===Asociación Argentina de Football - Copa Campeonato=== Alvear, Boca Alumni, San Fernando and Progresista made their debuts at the top division of Argentine football.Argentina 1922 at RSSSF ===Asociación Amateurs de Football=== ==References== Category:Argentine Primera División seasons Category:1922 in Argentine football Category:1922 in South American football
title: 1922 Argentine Primera División
